title: Integrated Strategy Development for Organizational Learning and Market Orientation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational management and marketing fundamentals, along with secondary-level mathematical analysis skills
context.additional_context: Professional Development Program Linking Market Knowledge Application and Organizational Learning Capability for Professionals, Conducted in a Limited-Tech Environment Focused on Smartphone-Based Resource Sharing

learning_goals: Comparative analysis of core concepts in organizational learning and market orientation through literature review
Case studies explaining the impact of market-oriented approaches (customer/competitor analysis) on organizational learning outcomes
Establishment of practical strategies (knowledge acquisition-sharing-utilization framework) integrating learning organizations with market orientation
Measurement of organizational learning effectiveness using mathematical analysis tools (e.g., SWOT matrix, competitiveness index calculation)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
